items.title: US sends world's largest warship towards Caribbean as it ramps up military presence
items.description: The deployment of the USS Gerald R Ford marks a major escalation in what the US says is a campaign to target drug traffickers.

items.title: What's in Reagan advert that caused US-Canada trade talks collapse?
items.description: Comparing the controversial advert quoting Ronald Reagan on tariffs with his original address.

items.title: Ontario to stop running anti-tariff advert that angered Trump
items.description: The advertisement will be paused from Monday so "trade talks can resume", Doug Ford says.

items.title: Ukraine allies pledge to take Russian oil and gas off global market
items.description: A "coalition of the willing" meeting in London seeks to increase pressure on Russia to end its war in Ukraine.

items.title: Woman gets rare whole-life sentence for murder of French schoolgirl
items.description: Dahbia Benkired is the first woman in France to receive a full life term following the shocking crime.
